text: Pidie Jaya Regency is a regency () in the Aceh Special region of Indonesia. It is located on the island of Sumatra. The regency was created out of part of Pidie Regency in 2007. The seat of the regency government is at Meureudu. The regency covers an area of 1,162.84 square kilometres and had a population of 132,956 people at the 2010 Census;Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. the latest official estimate (as at 2014) is 145,584.Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2016. == Administrative divisions == The regency is divided administratively into eight districts (kecamatan), listed below with their areas and their populations at the 2010 Census,Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. together with the official estimates of their population for mid 2014.Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2016.. The table also includes the number of administrative villages (desa and kelurahan) in each district, and its post code. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !
